product_name: Eider Target Aero Rain Jacket II - Men's
long_description: When your alpine foray involves intense activity and a good chance of rain, wear the Eider Target Aero Rain Jacket II. Its waterproof 3-layer GORE-TEX(R) Active fabric is ultra-breathable. Waterproof, windproof GORE-TEX Active 3-layer jacket is extremely breathable and designed for highly aerobic done-in-a-day activities. Minimal bulk makes this jacket very lightweight; fully seam-sealed. 3-layer construction means the waterproof membrane is bonded to both the outer layer and inner lining, which enhances durability and comfort. Waterproof zippers on center front, chest pocket and underarm vents. Hood easily adjusts. Chest pocket has gusset for extra storage capacity. Eider Target Aero Rain Jacket II for men has an adjustable hem and cuffs to seal weather out, warmth in.
short_description: When your alpine foray involves intense activity and a good chance of rain, wear the Eider Target Aero Rain Jacket II. Its waterproof 3-layer GORE-TEX(R) Active fabric is ultra-breathable.
